channel.title: Random Inconsequential Thoughts
channel.description: Recent content on Random Inconsequential Thoughts

item.title: About
item.description: Who I Am Hi, I’m Patrick Aikens. I’m a software engineer, and have been for a very long time. I started in the video games industry. Since then I have passed through the insurance industry and the banking industry before ending up at Manheim, Inc. where I remain today. My Blog This blog is built with Hugo, a great static website generator written in Go. I’m using the hugo-dusk theme.
